WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I am having problems with getting started with the Northwind database. I am using SQL Server 2008 to connect to the database, however, I am unable to login as the "Server name" is incorrect. Can someone please tell me how do I set that up? Do I need to setup a server? I have attached error message screenshots for your attention.

I have very little understanding of servers and stuff, so any help will be greatly appreciated.

Thanks
